channel.title: Installing no-ip on linux vps problem
channel.description: i am following this -->> http://www.no-ip.com/support/guides/update_clients/setting_up_linux_update_client.html and i have a problem with step 5, the "make install" part. Anyone that has experience with running their server on linux please help. I get this error [code]Connect to dynupdate.no-ip.com timed out Network must be operational to create configfile. Ending! [/code] when doing make install. Is their an alternative way to host my server? So far everything is going well, i have my server files up there and i can get server up and running, its just no-ip is the problem. Also, my vps obviously has its network operational, otherwise i wouldnt be able to connect to it and download files. Do i need no-ip to host? Or can i just run my server normally, then change my client so it connects to my vps ip?

item.title: Installing no-ip on linux vps problem
item.dc:creator: @thock321 thock321
item.description:
@thock321 wrote:

yeah i tried it and it worked, just forgot to edit the topic saying i dont need help anymore

Read full topic
